title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When I right-click on a field in TH and select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: When I right-click on a field in TH and select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu, the corresponding Javadoc should be added to the field.
SR:
1. Open TH.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu.
4. Observe that no Javadoc is added to the field.
